overview: The almanac was filmed by students of the 2nd TV directing course of the I.K. Karpenko-Kary Kyiv National University of Theater, Film and Television for four months, which changed the country. These are stories about people for whom the Maidan has become an integral part of their lives - from dancing... to gunshots. These are eyewitness accounts, in which emotions are sometimes more important than words.
title: Black Book of Maidan
